answers.answer: Hi Kerria,Welcome to MedHelp!  We currently do not have an expert for these forums, but we plan on having one soon.  In the mean time it would be best to post your question in the most relevant forum.  If you have a question about insulin for example you would post in the Diabetes forum.  Please let us know if we can help you in any way :D

question: Hi- It's unclear to me how to post a question to the "Ask a Doctor' forum or to the 'Ask a Pharmacist' forum. Please explain how/ where to post?thank you
title: how do you post a question to the 'Ask a pharmacist' forum?
